text: yosaelo bohodoen ma-eul an-igeona jangbyeog dwiga anin isang geudeul-i hande mungchyeo geudaedeulgwa ssaujineun anh-eul geos-ila. geudeul saiui allyeog-eun simhadoda. geudaeneun geudeul-i hande mungchyeo issda saeng-gaghana geudeul-ui ma-eum-eun heut-eojyeo issdoda. geuleoham-eun geudeul-i iseong-eul sseul jul moleuneun muliigi ttaemun-ila
